phrases: Trapnest means a nest box with a trap.
Once you enter, you cannot get out on your own.
I figured it was a name a possessive man would think of.
Blinking eyes call the wind
A smile clears all the noise away
The angel in your eyes whispers
Everything begins now
Can you feel it now Can you feel it now
It is like being caught in a wave
Pulling on my heart Pulling on my heart
Breath held, arms reaching out
Baby this world is different from yesterday's
You are the only one I can see
Baby my wish on a wing
This sky is torn
By a single overflowing word
NANA BECAUSE HACHIKO'S NOT FEELING WELL, I WILL NOT BE DROPPING BY FOR A WHILE.
BUT YOU BEGIN RECORDING TOMORROW, SO YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE TO LEAVE THE STUDIO ANYWAY, RIGHT?
WELL, DO YOUR BEST.
Mr. Honjo.
Mr. Honjo.
Excuse me.
We have arrived at your place.
How do you open the garage door?
Oh, well, you insert the key there...
Key?
The card key.
First you insert it...
Oh, such a drag.
Say, Kinoshita.
How do you plan to get home at this hour?
I will take a taxi.
Why not use this to go home?
What?!
Are you sure?!
You know, I would be happy
if you could come pick me up in that tomorrow.
Not a problem at all!
If you would like, I could use the company car
to pick you up and drop you off every day!
With the tough schedule you keep, it would be dangerous driving every day.
Imagine if you got in an accident and this car is totaled.
You are more worried about the car than about me.
But you are driving a super rare 1965 Mustang Shelby!
I did not care what car I drive so long as it moves,
but Takumi went through the trouble of finding it for me.
Something about our image.
You know, Mr. Honjo, you have got all this money and ability,
but you do not desire for much, do you?
Even your songs.
You write them according to Takumi's instructions.
I believe your true talents shine through when you play punk.
As long as I get to play guitar, anything will do.
Well, I for one want to hear Ren Honjo's soul shout!
You want to hear my soul shout?
Ah, well...
But doing as Takumi says
is not something limited to you and the other band members.
Do not tell anyone I told you, but everyone is saying,
we are all soldiers serving under Takumi.
Who is everyone?
Um...
But Takumi does have the talents and decision-making skills
to back his actions.
He is able to come through on what he says.
I respect him for that.
Then tell this to everyone.
If anyone's not satisfied with how Takumi does things,
they are free to quit.
We do not need any soldiers who are unwilling to fight with us.
THE PAPARAZZI ARE SO ANNOYING.
I WILL BE HIDING IN THE USUAL ROOM AT THE USUAL HOTEL.
COME IF YOU FEEL UP TO IT.
I cannot come up with the lyrics.
The theme is a love ballad that will make people cry.
Do not come to me about it.
Why do they always hafta be love songs,
just because they are more popular?
Why do Japanese people like love stories so much?
Cannot I write a song about world peace?
Well, not that I could write a song about that.
What will I do?
We begin recording tomorrow.
Technically, you begin today.
Shin, why are you being so cold today?
Am I?
Maybe it is because I am tired of being a good boy.
A good boy?
When are you good?
For this past month, I have not skipped a day of practice.
I have been respecting the studio's no smoking policy,
and I am playing music like the director wants me to.
But this is getting real boring.
What?
You are not allowed to smoke in Gaia's rehearsal studios?
Usually, we are allowed to smoke even in the recording studios.
What musician would use such a place?
It is a teaching studio.
There is a professional training school next door,
and students from there use the studio.
Wow.
There is a school there.
Gaia's pretty impressive.
Are the top students able to debut as pros?
I wonder.
Does not interest me.
To be honest, I do not care about the debut.
If I could have fun playing in a band, that is good enough for me.
You are right!
Music is something that should be enjoyed!
Let us go out and dance all night like crazy to release some of that tension!
Okay?!
What are you saying?
This is your job, Reira.
You are getting paid for this, so you have got to take it seriously.
Come on, concentrate.
You can release all your frustrations
by writing down whatever's on your mind.
You are right.
Maybe I will write about getting rid of them mosquitoes.
But you are writing a love ballad, right?
Are not you hungry?
Can I call room service?
Reira was in love with Takumi.
What a pretty song.
Ren is a genius indeed.
It will be ruined by my shallow love story...
You are wrong about that.
A love story written by someone who can she would tears like that
is not going to be shallow.
The reason Trapnest has the support of so many female fans
is because they can relate to your love stories.
I am impressed.
You are really good with words.
For me, this is my job.
I make money from this.
I am dead serious.
FROM: NAOKI DATE AND TIME SENT: AUGUST 31, 2001, 16:37 TO: YASU SUBJECT: SEE YOU TONIGHT AT YOUR PLACE.
WE BEGIN RECORDING OUR SINGLE TOMORROW.
AND SO, WE WILL NOT BE ABLE TO GO ANYWHERE FOR A WEEK.
SO LET US DRINK ALL NIGHT TONIGHT!!
If I do that, it will because a scandal.
You are too self conscious.
Ren and Takumi are doing whatever they want, and it has not been a problem.
It has been a problem.
A real problem.
The papa-rakkyo just will not go away.
I hear that female vocal from your band has been staying at Ren's place.
Would you please give her a lecture?
Huh?
What are papa-rakkyo?
Paparazzi.
Really?
Yeah.
They are targeting all the band members,
but I am the only one being careful about it.
The company put Reira in a hotel to protect her.
But I am pretty sure Takumi went to see Hachiko today.
He was looking restless all day, and rushed home the moment we were done.
By Hachiko, do you mean?
Nana.
I have never met her,
but from what I hear, she knows how to control a man.
She is really something.
One day, she says she wants to see you,
the next day she blocks your calls.
She is a great strategist, not to mention a great cook and great in bed.
Even if not Takumi, any guy would fall for a woman like that.
Impressive, I would say.
Who is she?
Naoki, you have got it wrong.
Besides, I thought those two broke up.
No, I doubt that will happen.
Takumi would never let a girl he is infatuated with
run away so easily.
He is such a fool, not realizing that he is playing into Hachiko's hands.
Put an end to things first, and then come to me.
But I did.
That is why I came.
Why are not you saying anything?
Say something!
Are you going to step up or just walk away?
The baby's growing even as we speak!
What is the matter?
Hello, Hachiko?
Oh, Nana, you are there, too?
Takumi?
Perfect timing.
I wanted to talk to you as well.
Can you and Nobu come here now?
I am not getting anywhere over the phone.
Come where?!
And why are you calling from Hachiko's cell phone?!
I am just borrowing it for a bit.
I am at your place right now.
What are you doing at our place?!
How dare you fool around with someone else's woman!
Hachi's dating Nobu now!
I know that, but...
He is the one who fooled around with someone else's woman.
Is Hachi there?
Yeah, she is here.
Let me talk to her.
It is useless talking with you.
Nana, Nana wants to talk to you.
Looks like she is in no condition to talk to you.
What did you do to her?!
No, I did not do anything.
Anyway, we will be there right away!
We are in the neighborhood!
Really?
Then can you buy some grapefruits
and a bottle of sparkling water on your way?
Huh?!
I will squeeze the fruit and have her drink it.
She seems to be having a really bad case of morning sickness.
She is in pain.
I am counting on you, okay?
Morning sickness?
Morning sickness?
Yeah.
I will have the grapefruit juice.
Oh, but it is just the summer heat.
I am all right.
I cannot really explain it.
Like, maternal instinct?
Nobu... you...
When you do it with Hachi, do you use a condom?
Answer me!
Of course I do.
Every time?
Yeah.
From before you insert?!
Yeah.
You liar!
You must have done it at least a bit without any protection!
Never without protection!
Why are you so damn serious all the time?
What are you saying?
Is being serious a bad thing?!
If she gets pregnant, I do not have the money to raise a kid!
So, of course!
Then it is Takumi's child?
What are you crying for?
I am the one who wants to cry.
If it is not your child, then say so!
Then I am sure Hachi will not have it!
I cannot say that!
I will sound like I am irresponsible.
I did it with her too,
so the possibility of it being my child is not zero percent.
Besides, Hachi probably already knows that it is Takumi's child.
Is not that why she told him?
Otherwise, she would not be seeing him.
I mean, there is no other reason.
He is the one who fooled around with someone else's woman.
Then you should become the father.
What are you saying?
Do not make it sound so simple.
If it is about money, I am sure we can work it out!
We have got our debut coming up for one thing.
And I cannot imagine Takumi becoming the guardian
of the child he had by accident!
He said he would.
Even if it were my child.
He is just saying that so he can keep Hachi to himself!
That man wants to take advantage of the child to get her for himself!
Are not you doing the same?!
You are taking advantage of me to get Hachi for yourself, right?!
Cut it out already.
That is definitely screwed up.
If you are going to insist, why do not you become the father?
Although, I cannot imagine you feeling any love for Takumi's child.
There is no way I could.
No!
Do not keep it!
Those two are sure taking their time.
Do not get so stressed.
Right now, you need to lie down.
You would not want a miscarriage, would you?
You know, I think you have gained a little weight.
I thought women usually lose weight
during the days of morning sickness.
My older sister had a bad case of morning sickness, too.
I was in eleventh grade and she was twenty.
She got married as a result.
Her husband is a hard-working office worker,
a very reliable man, unlike me.
But I got so pissed off when I found out,
and I beat him up pretty badly.
My sister cried and Reira laughed at me for being so possessive.
It was horrible.
Come to think of it, you are also twenty years old.
Though, you are not very mature for your age.
You do not have a full-time job
and when you get lonely you are quick to sleep with some guy.
And as luck would have it, now you are pregnant.
You are hopeless.
Your parents are going to cry.
But who am I to tell you this, right?
Regardless who the kid's father is,
there is no mistake that you are the mother.
So pull yourself together.
They are finally here.
You are late.
I thought you ran away.
Huh?
You are alone?
What about Nana?
I do not know.
Geez, she has not gone off to Ren's place again, has she?
Oh, did you find grapefruits?
Huh?
GARLIC PICKLED IN SOY SAUCE
You are not very thoughtful, are you?
Never mind.
I will go buy some.
It is not really something the three of us can have a friendly chat about anyway.
The choice is Nana's.
The child does not need two fathers, right?
Nana...
Is it true that you are pregnant?
Hey, I want to hear it directly from you.
It could be my child.
There is no need to hide it from me.
And I knew that you had just broken up with Takumi.
I am sorry.
Why... are you apologizing?
Did not you break up with him?!
Please make up an excuse.
I do not care if it is a lie.
I will believe you.
I am sorry.
A ring of oath
Our red string
We cannot see it now
No promises either Do not let go of this hand you have held
It is embarrassing, so do not read it out loud!
Even I find it bad.
I should hire a ghostwriter to write it.
Say, what is the meaning of this red string?
Huh?
Do not you know?
No.
It is an invisible string of fate that is tied onto the little fingers
of two lovers who are meant to be together.
Wow.
I bet girls fall for that sort of stuff.
But I am not interested in such theories of fate.
It does not matter what the relationship.
I believe people are bound by trust.
Is that what you mean by this hand you have held?
Maybe it is sour grapes because I have not found that someone to love.
It is a nice song.
Thank you.
You made me feel better, Shin.
I have got to do my best to go platinum again.
You know, Hachi...
I wanted to keep you by my side,
even if it meant putting a collar around your neck.
I was afraid of myself for thinking that,
so I always kept a little distance between us.
Even now, I cannot make friends easily.
I am still...
afraid.
I cannot count how many nights
I wished tomorrow would never come
To live as I am without being fake
What do I need
If I do not believe in myself, what can I believe in
The answer is too close to see
Black tears are falling down
I have nothing, only sadness
I cannot put it into words
My whole body starts to ache
I cannot stand it anymore on my own
